sourcesContent:
<template>
    <form @submit.prevent>
        <input 
        v-bind:value=newLists.title
        @input="newLists.title = $event.target.value"
        type="text" 
        placeholder="title">
        <input 
        v-bind:value=newLists.description 
        @input="takeDescription"
        type="text" 
        placeholder="description">
        <button 
        >Создать</button>
    </form>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    data() {
        return {
            newLists: {
                title: '',
                description: '', 
            }
        }
    },
    methods: {
        takeTitle(event) {
            this.newLists.title  = event.target.value;
        },
        takeDescription(event) {
            this.newLists.description = event.target.value;
        },
    },
}
    
</script>

<style scoped>
input {
    border: 2px solid green;
    padding: 20px;
    margin-top: 10px;
}
button {
    align-self: self-end;
    background-color: #fff;
    padding: 10px;
    color: green;
    border: 2px solid green;
    margin-top:10px;
}
form {
    display:flex;
    flex-direction: column;
}
</style>
